column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Decent.  I went here to meet a friend.  Initially
column2: I was impressed with the atmosphere
column3: but then we got seated in the far back room where it had more of a sterile environment.  We ordered the Sangria
column6: but if you've never had Sangria
column7: I guess its an OK introductory.  The food was fine
column8: nothing spectacular.  Being at a Tapas Bar I was really looking for some bold flavors
column9: but found none.  I think this place is only popular for it's trendy atmosphere.  If you know what good Spanish food is like you might find yourself a little disappointed.  Anyway
column11: I know that there is better out there
